caterpillar.translation[0].definitions[0: a small creature like a worm with many legs that eats leaves and that develops into a butterfly or other flying insect
caterpillar.translation[1].definitions[0: a metal belt made of short connected pieces that is fastened over the wheels of a heavy vehicle to help it to move over soft ground
a Caterpillar tractor  (=a vehicle fitted with this belt)
